subject: p15192710
Findings: One portable AP upright view of the chest. No pneumothorax is seen. Subcutaneous air is unchanged. The left lower lobe opacity is unchanged. Right lung is clear. The cardiac, mediastinal, and hilar contours are normal. The most superior portions of the apices are slightly obscured by patients chin.
Impression: No interval pneumothorax seen however, the most superior portion of the apices are slightly blurred by the patients chin. Left lower lobe opacity and subcutaneous are are unchanged.
